references: Related: CF 187754, CF 187840, CF 187460. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lot 4, Block 8, Waddell's Madrona Park Addition; Lots 1 and 4, Block 129, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition; North 80 feet of Lot 2, Block 33, J. H. Nagle's 1st Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-189 and 17-138, respectively.
